text:
2. 常春藤（Hedera helix）
• 益处：它是一种很强的空气净化植物，能吸收室内空气中的甲醛、苯和霉菌。
• 护理：喜阴凉的环境，但也需要一定的光线，保持土壤湿润但不积水。
3. 龟背竹（Monstera deliciosa）
• 益处：它的叶片可以增加湿度，并且能够吸收空气中的有害气体，适合用作大型装饰植物。
• 护理：喜欢散射光和湿润的环境，需要定期给叶片喷水以保持湿度。
trans:
2. Hedera Helix
• Benefits: It is a powerful air-purifying plant that absorbs formaldehyde, benzene, and mold from indoor air.
• Care: Prefers cool, shady environments but needs some light, keep the soil moist but not waterlogged.
3. Monstera Deliciosa
• Benefits: Its leaves increase humidity and can absorb harmful gases from the air, making it suitable as a large decorative plant.
• Care: Prefers diffused light and humid environments, needs regular misting of leaves to maintain humidity.
